attributes.action: Law for the Protection of the honor & dignity of the Christian faith
attributes.additional_details:
People have misused  the freedom of speech act and have created offensive literature and media which has created so much hatred and negativity in our communities. This is not good for our public or our country.

We need to be bit more sensitive and understanding about the Christian faith.
We ask that our beliefs are considered and respected with regard to media and literature.

We ask that parliament discuss this matter and consider making new laws for the protection of honor & dignity of all the religious leaders, beliefs, profits  and saints of all religions of the world.
